Introduction
This topic contains information on the payment of Parents’ DIC in Philippine cases, including
applying the income provisions of 38 CFR 3.251
, and
preparing awards of Parents’ DIC
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D - Awards and Payments for Benefits Due to Philippine Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D
